# WEAPON::SET_EQIPPED_WEAPON_START_SPINNING_AT_FULL_SPEED

## Summary
Set the eqipped weapon (e.g., minigun) start spinning at full speed (no spin up phase)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
